name: Buckets the Boss Hunter
description:
buckets the boss hunter is a bucket who is hunting the group known as the triple R's, the boss known as ReDemon is trying to stop him

W - Jump A - Left S - Crouch D - Right Space - Punch E/M  - Right Dash 

Q/N - Left Dash 4&5 - Space&W control swap

Code input

First Digit - E/N/H depending on difficulty

Second Digit - 0

Third Digit - 1/2/3 depending on boss 

Fourth Digit - B
